commands.description: Gets the avatar (profile picture) of a specified user or your own if no user is mentioned.

details.usage:
/avatar (Get your own avatar)
/avatar <@username> (Get the avatar of a mentioned user)

parameters.user (optional): The user whose avatar you want to retrieve. If not provided, the command will show your avatar.

commands.description: Get information about the Desire bot.

details.usage: /botinfo

commands.description: Allows you to edit or create your profile.

details.usage: /profile edit

commands.description: Allows you to view your own or another user's profile.

details.usage:
/profile view (View your own profile)
/profile view <@username> (View another user's profile)

parameters.user (optional): The user whose profile you want to view. If not provided, your own profile will be displayed.

commands.description: Gets the server's banner image.

details.usage: /serverbanner

commands.description: Gets the server's icon image.

details.usage: /servericon

commands.description: Gets information about the current server.

details.usage: /serverinfo

commands.description: Bans a user from the server.

details.usage: /ban <@username> "Reason for ban" (Replace with the actual user and reason)

parameters.user (required): The user you want to ban.

commands.description: Restricts a user from viewing channels in the server.

details.usage: /jail <@username> "Reason for jailing" (Replace with the actual user and reason)

parameters.user (required): The user you want to jail.

commands.description: Kicks a user from the server.

details.usage: /kick <@username> "Reason for kick" (Replace with the actual user and reason)

parameters.user (required): The user you want to kick.

commands.description: Mutes a user in the server, preventing them from sending messages or speaking.

details.usage: /mute <@username> "Reason for mute" (Replace with the actual user and reason)

parameters.user (required): The user you want to mute.

commands.description: Unbans a user from the server.

details.usage: /unban 123456789012345678 "Reason for unbanning" (Replace with the actual user ID and reason)

parameters.user_id (required): The user ID of the user you want to unban (not a mention).

commands.description: Removes the 'Jailed' role from a user, restoring their access to channels.

details.usage: /unjail <@username> "Reason for unjailing" (Replace with the actual user and reason)

parameters.user (required): The user you want to unjail.

commands.description: Unmutes a user in the server, allowing them to send messages and speak.

details.usage: /unmute <@username> "Reason for unmute" (Replace with the actual user and reason)

parameters.user (required): The user you want to unmute.

commands.description: Creates a new text or voice channel in the specified category.

details.usage: /channel create "new-channel" Text Category Name

parameters.name (required): The name of the new channel.
parameters.type (required): The type of channel to create ("Text" or "Voice").
parameters.category (required): The category where the channel should be created.

commands.description: Deletes the specified channel.

details.usage: /channel delete #channel-name (Replace with the actual channel name)

parameters.channel (required): The channel you want to delete.

commands.description: Hides the specified channel from the @everyone role.

details.usage: /channel hide #channel-name (Replace with the actual channel name)

parameters.channel (required): The channel you want to hide.

commands.description: Unhides the specified channel, making it visible to the @everyone role.

details.usage: /channel unhide #channel-name (Replace with the actual channel name)

parameters.channel (required): The channel you want to unhide.

commands.description: Locks the specified channel, preventing @everyone from sending messages.

details.usage: /channel lock #channel-name "Reason for locking" (Replace with the actual channel name and reason)

parameters.channel (required): The channel you want to lock.
parameters.reason (optional): The reason for locking the channel.

commands.description: Unlocks the specified channel, allowing @everyone to send messages.

details.usage: /channel unlock #channel-name "Reason for unlocking" (Replace with the actual channel name and reason)

parameters.channel (required): The channel you want to unlock.
parameters.reason (optional): The reason for unlocking the channel.

commands.description: Configure the Desire bot settings for this server.

details.usage: /configure
